mapper.update: update comment set fromid = #{fromid}, toid = #{toid}, urlid = #{urlid}, favurlid = #{favurlid}, sendtime = #{sendtime}, content = #{content} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.fromid, a.toid, a.urlid, a.favurlid, a.sendtime, a.content, b.nickname, b.avatarURL, d.nickname AS tonickname from comment as a left join user as b on a.fromid =b.id LEFT JOIN tsahaylu.user AS d ON a.toid = d.id where a.urlid = #{urlid} order by a.sendtime DESC limit #{startCursor},10

SELECT a.id, a.fromid, a.toid, a.urlid, a.favurlid, a.sendtime, a.content, b.nickname, b.avatarURL, d.nickname AS tonickname FROM comment AS a LEFT JOIN tsahaylu.user AS b ON a.fromid = b.id LEFT JOIN tsahaylu.user AS d ON a.toid = d.id WHERE a.urlid = #{urlid} AND a.fromid IN ( SELECT c.toid FROM friend AS c WHERE c.fromid = #{userid} AND STATUS = 1 ) ORDER BY a.sendtime DESC LIMIT #{startCursor},10
